title: Forsale earliest team cabinet/Albume I have ever seen...
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Forsale earliest team cabinet/Albume I have ever seen...
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim Manos
Cabinet mount is 9 3/4 x 8 has 9 players high top shoes, ring Spalding bats all the same uniform shirt, hat,socks, and pants. The odd thing is there tie's are all different. Very early piece 1870's. $395
